node.title: All I want for Christmas is:
node.author: marto

data.field: World peace. A piece of the world :) An [http://www.artlebedev.com/portfolio/optimus/|Optimus keyboard]. A subscription to [http://www.makezine.com/|Make]. Something shiny, with flashing lights ! To spend time with my loved ones. To spend time avoiding my loved ones. None of the above (please specify).
